handleParts

protected boolean handleParts(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message,
                              Object con,
                              StringBuffer sbPlain,
                              ArrayList<MessageAttachment> attachmentList)
                       throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                              javax.mail.MessagingException,
                              IOException
Handle the parts of the given message. The method will call itself recursively to handle all nested parts

Parameters:
message - the MimeMessage
con - the current processing Content
sbPlain - the StringBuffer to fill with text
attachmentList - ArrayList with attachments
Throws:
UnsupportedEncodingException
javax.mail.MessagingException
IOException
